metadata.title: CVE-2017-12596 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In OpenEXR 2.2.0, a crafted image causes a heap-based buffer over-read inthe hufDecode function in IlmImf/ImfHuf.cpp during exrmaketiled execution;it may result in denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopenexr22 - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1
openexr - 2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openexr package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-11.1ubuntu1').
